languages.text: "Emelina carries knowledge that is forbidden to common servants of the Imperium. She carries this knowledge within herself, as it cannot be entrusted to logs or cogitators." {n}Heinrix frowns.{/n} "I said before that acolytes of the Inquisition must shoulder a heavy burden — to come into contact with things that can penetrate and corrupt the soul. For Sages, this is an especially trying ordeal. Emelina's hypermnesia has been enhanced so that she now remembers everything she sees, however briefly. After many years of service, she has examined and seen enough to become an unrivalled expert in this field."
languages.original_text: "Эмелина носит запретные для простых слуг Империума познания в себе, не доверяя их ни журналам, ни когитаторам". {n}Хейнрикс морщится.{/n} "Я говорил ранее, что на аколитов Инквизиции возложено тяжелое бремя — соприкасаться с тем, что может затронуть и исказить душу. Для савантов это особенное испытание. Гипермнезия Эмелины была особым образом усилена — она запоминает все, что видит, моментально. И за долгие годы изучила и повидала достаточно, чтобы стать исключительным экспертом в этой области".

languages.text: "Эмелина носит запретные для простых слуг Империума познания в себе, не доверяя их ни журналам, ни когитаторам". {n}Хейнрикс морщится.{/n} "Я говорил ранее, что на аколитов Инквизиции возложено тяжелое бремя — соприкасаться с тем, что может затронуть и исказить душу. Для савантов это особенное испытание. Гипермнезия Эмелины была особым образом усилена — она запоминает все, что видит, моментально. И за долгие годы изучила и повидала достаточно, чтобы стать исключительным экспертом в этой области".

“艾米莉娜掌握着帝国的普通仆人不允许接触的知识。这些知识绝不能记录在日志或沉思者上，于是她便将这些知识储存在她自己体内。”{n}海因里希皱起了眉。{/n}“我之前说过，审判庭的侍仆肩负着沉重的负担，因为每个人都要接触那些会腐蚀灵魂、渗透其中的邪恶之物。对贤者而言，这样的负担尤为沉重。艾米莉娜的超凡记忆力得到了强化，如今只要是她见过的东西，哪怕仅仅看上一眼，她都能牢牢记住。在审判庭服侍了这么多年，她见识过了相当多的东西，这足以让她成为这个领域无与伦比的专家。”
languages.original_text: "Emelina carries knowledge that is forbidden to common servants of the Imperium. She carries this knowledge within herself, as it cannot be entrusted to logs or cogitators." {n}Heinrix frowns.{/n} "I said before that acolytes of the Inquisition must shoulder a heavy burden — to come into contact with things that can penetrate and corrupt the soul. For Sages, this is an especially trying ordeal. Emelina's hypermnesia has been enhanced so that she now remembers everything she sees, however briefly. After many years of service, she has examined and seen enough to become an unrivalled expert in this field."

languages.text: «Emelina posee un conocimiento prohibido para los sirvientes corrientes del Imperium. Es algo que no se puede confiar a registros ni cogitadores, por lo que lo lleva en su interior». {n}Heinrix frunce el ceño.{/n} «He dicho antes que los acólitos de la Inquisición deben soportar la pesada carga de entrar en contacto con cosas que pueden infiltrarse en su alma y corromperla. Para los sabios, esto supone un calvario particularmente duro. La hipermnesia de Emelina se ha mejorado para que recuerde todo lo que ve, aunque sea por un instante. Tras sus muchos años de servicio, ha examinado y visto lo suficiente para convertirse en una experta sin igual en este campo».
languages.original_text: "Emelina carries knowledge that is forbidden to common servants of the Imperium. She carries this knowledge within herself, as it cannot be entrusted to logs or cogitators." {n}Heinrix frowns.{/n} "I said before that acolytes of the Inquisition must shoulder a heavy burden — to come into contact with things that can penetrate and corrupt the soul. For Sages, this is an especially trying ordeal. Emelina's hypermnesia has been enhanced so that she now remembers everything she sees, however briefly. After many years of service, she has examined and seen enough to become an unrivalled expert in this field."

Es algo que no se puede confiar a registros ni cogitadores, por lo que lo lleva en su interior». {n}Heinrix frunce el ceño.{/n} «He dicho antes que los acólitos de la Inquisición deben soportar la pesada carga de entrar en contacto con cosas que pueden infiltrarse en su alma y corromperla. Para los sabios, esto supone un calvario particularmente duro. La hipermnesia de Emelina se ha mejorado para que recuerde todo lo que ve, aunque sea por un instante. Tras sus muchos años de servicio, ha examinado y visto lo suficiente para convertirse en una experta sin igual en este campo».

languages.text: 「エメリナには帝国の一般奉仕者には禁じらた知識があります。彼女はこの知識を自分自身の中に貯めています。それはログや考算機に任せることができないからです」{n}ハインリックスは眉を顰める。{/n}「前にも言いましたが、異端審問庁のアコライトは、魂に侵入し破壊する可能性があるものと接触するという重責を担わなければなりません。賢者にとって、これは特に困難な試練です。エメリナの記憶過剰は強くなり、今では見るものすべてを覚えています。ごく短期間の記憶しか持ちませんが。長年の奉仕を経て、彼女はこの分野の比類ない専門家になるのに十分なほどのことを調べ、見てきました」
languages.original_text: "Emelina carries knowledge that is forbidden to common servants of the Imperium. She carries this knowledge within herself, as it cannot be entrusted to logs or cogitators." {n}Heinrix frowns.{/n} "I said before that acolytes of the Inquisition must shoulder a heavy burden — to come into contact with things that can penetrate and corrupt the soul. For Sages, this is an especially trying ordeal. Emelina's hypermnesia has been enhanced so that she now remembers everything she sees, however briefly. After many years of service, she has examined and seen enough to become an unrivalled expert in this field."

traits.locale_text: 「エメリナには帝国の一般奉仕者には禁じらた知識があります。彼女はこの知識を自分自身の中に貯めています。それはログや考算機に任せることができないからです」{n}ハインリックスは眉を顰める。{/n}「前にも言いましたが、異端審問庁のアコライトは、魂に侵入し破壊する可能性があるものと接触するという重責を担わなければなりません。賢者にとって、これは特に困難な試練です。エメリナの記憶過剰は強くなり、今では見るものすべてを覚えています。ごく短期間の記憶しか持ちませんが。長年の奉仕を経て、彼女はこの分野の比類ない専門家になるのに十分なほどのことを調べ、見てきました」

languages.text: « Emelina possède des connaissances qui sont interdites aux serviteurs ordinaires de l'Imperium. Ces informations sont enregistrées en elle parce qu'elles sont trop confidentielles pour être consignées dans des journaux ou confiées à des cogitateurs. Je vous ai déjà dit que les acolytes de l'Inquisition devaient porter un lourd fardeau, {n}continue Heinrix en fronçant les sourcils.{/n} Ils sont amenés à côtoyer des entités capables de pénétrer l'âme et de la corrompre. Pour les sages, c'est une épreuve particulièrement rude. L'hypermnésie d'Emelina a été améliorée au point qu'elle mémorise tout ce qu'elle voit, même brièvement. Après des années de service, elle a vu et étudié tant de choses que son expertise est sans égale dans ce domaine. »
languages.original_text: "Emelina carries knowledge that is forbidden to common servants of the Imperium. She carries this knowledge within herself, as it cannot be entrusted to logs or cogitators." {n}Heinrix frowns.{/n} "I said before that acolytes of the Inquisition must shoulder a heavy burden — to come into contact with things that can penetrate and corrupt the soul. For Sages, this is an especially trying ordeal. Emelina's hypermnesia has been enhanced so that she now remembers everything she sees, however briefly. After many years of service, she has examined and seen enough to become an unrivalled expert in this field."

traits.locale_text: « Emelina possède des connaissances qui sont interdites aux serviteurs ordinaires de l'Imperium. Ces informations sont enregistrées en elle parce qu'elles sont trop confidentielles pour être consignées dans des journaux ou confiées à des cogitateurs. Je vous ai déjà dit que les acolytes de l'Inquisition devaient porter un lourd fardeau, {n}continue Heinrix en fronçant les sourcils.{/n} Ils sont amenés à côtoyer des entités capables de pénétrer l'âme et de la corrompre. Pour les sages, c'est une épreuve particulièrement rude. L'hypermnésie d'Emelina a été améliorée au point qu'elle mémorise tout ce qu'elle voit, même brièvement. Après des années de service, elle a vu et étudié tant de choses que son expertise est sans égale dans ce domaine. »

languages.text: "Emelina trägt Informationen in sich, die gewöhnliche Diener des Imperiums nicht wissen dürfen. Und sie trägt sie deswegen in sich, weil sie Logs und Cogitatoren nicht anvertraut werden können." {n}Heinrix verzieht das Gesicht.{/n} "Ich sagte bereits, dass auf Akolythen der Inquisition eine große Bürde liegt – sie kommen in Kontakt mit Dingen, die in die Seele eindringen und sie verderben können. Für Weise ist das eine besonders schwer zu ertragende Tortur. Emelinas Hypermnesie wurde verstärkt, damit sie sich an alles erinnert, was sie sieht, egal wie kurz. Nach vielen Jahren im Einsatz hat sie genügend erlebt und gesehen, um auf diesem Gebiet eine unvergleichliche Expertin zu sein."
languages.original_text: "Emelina carries knowledge that is forbidden to common servants of the Imperium. She carries this knowledge within herself, as it cannot be entrusted to logs or cogitators." {n}Heinrix frowns.{/n} "I said before that acolytes of the Inquisition must shoulder a heavy burden — to come into contact with things that can penetrate and corrupt the soul. For Sages, this is an especially trying ordeal. Emelina's hypermnesia has been enhanced so that she now remembers everything she sees, however briefly. After many years of service, she has examined and seen enough to become an unrivalled expert in this field."

Für Weise ist das eine besonders schwer zu ertragende Tortur. Emelinas Hypermnesie wurde verstärkt, damit sie sich an alles erinnert, was sie sieht, egal wie kurz. Nach vielen Jahren im Einsatz hat sie genügend erlebt und gesehen, um auf diesem Gebiet eine unvergleichliche Expertin zu sein."

languages.text: "Emelina, İmparatorluk'un sıradan hizmetkârlarına yasaklı olan bilgileri taşır. Bu bilgiler kayıtlara veya kavramsayarlara emanet edilemeyeceği için onları kendi içinde taşır." {n}Heinrix kaşlarını çatıyor.{/n} "Daha önce Engizisyon havarilerinin ağır bir yük omuzlamak zorunda kaldıklarını söylemiştim: Ruhu delip geçebilen ve yozlaştırabilen şeylerle etkileşime girmek. Âlimler için bu özellikle zorlu bir mücadeledir. Emelina'nın hipermnezisi, gördüğü en küçük detayı bile hatırlamasını sağlayacak şekilde geliştirildi. Yıllardır hizmet veriyor ve bu sırada da alanında rakipsiz bir uzman hâline gelmesini sağlayacak kadar çok şey gördü ve inceledi."
languages.original_text: "Emelina carries knowledge that is forbidden to common servants of the Imperium. She carries this knowledge within herself, as it cannot be entrusted to logs or cogitators." {n}Heinrix frowns.{/n} "I said before that acolytes of the Inquisition must shoulder a heavy burden — to come into contact with things that can penetrate and corrupt the soul. For Sages, this is an especially trying ordeal. Emelina's hypermnesia has been enhanced so that she now remembers everything she sees, however briefly. After many years of service, she has examined and seen enough to become an unrivalled expert in this field."

Yıllardır hizmet veriyor ve bu sırada da alanında rakipsiz bir uzman hâline gelmesini sağlayacak kadar çok şey gördü ve inceledi."
